articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction to an absorbing weekend of Premier League football as Man Utd dramatically win the derby & Chelsea win again.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Man Utd claim stunning derby win & Southampton sack Martin

articles.description: England's slide towards a massive defeat in the third Test against New Zealand is compounded by a concerning recurrence of Ben Stokes' hamstring injury.
articles.title: New Zealand vs England: Ben Stokes injured and Kane Williamson makes century in Hamilton

articles.description: The Buffalo Bills played in another high-scoring thriller, Patrick Mahomes picked up a worrying injury and three teams booked play-off places on Sunday.
articles.title: NFL results & week 15 recap: Josh Allen leads Bills, Mahomes injury worry for Chiefs

articles.title: South Africa vs England LIVE: Women's Test, day two, Bloemfontein - cricket score, radio commentary & updates

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola faces a mammoth rebuild to revive the fading champions after shock Manchester United loss
articles.title: Man City 1-2 Man Utd: Crisis-hit Pep Guardiola faces huge rebuild

articles.description: Australia's seamers ensure they stay in control of the third Test against India, despite rain decimating much of day three in Brisbane.
articles.title: Australia vs India: Hosts' seamers impress but rain ruins day three of third Test in Brisbane

articles.description: Sir Mark Cavendish to be honoured with the Lifetime Achievement award at BBC Sports Personality of the Year.
articles.title: Sports Personality of the Year 2024: Sir Mark Cavendish wins Lifetime Achievement award

articles.title: Sydney Sixers v Melbourne Renegades - Cricket - BBC Sport

articles.description: LeBron James scores 18 points as he returns from a two-game absence in the Los Angeles Lakers' win against the Grizzlies.
articles.title: LeBron James returns as LA Lakers coast to win against Memphis Grizzlies

articles.description: Guha apologises after her remark about Indian cricketer Jasprit Bumrah caused a backlash.
articles.title: Isa Guha: Commentator sorry for calling Jasprit Bumrah 'primate'
